featured.text: He may dream at night of being alone in the playground, 28 a lion.
27 , a boy is having difficulties on the school playground because a bigger boy keeps bullying him.
Completely wheelchair-accessible, the park features 25 acres of attractions including rides, playgrounds, a catch-and-release fishing lake, and picnic areas throughout the park.

definition.zh_def: 遊樂場，供兒童玩耍的戶外區域，通常設有各種遊具。
definition.en_def: A playground is an outdoor area designed for children to play, typically equipped with various play structures.
definition.example: The children spent the afternoon at the playground, swinging and sliding.
